alert.note: Alert for Cheshire (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 26 at 7:28PM EDT until June 26 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM EDT FOR WEST CENTRAL CHESHIRE COUNTY... At 727 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Chesterfield, or 9 miles southwest of Keene, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Keene, Winchester, Westmoreland, Swanzey, Chesterfield, Surry, Roxbury, Walpole and Marlborough. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
